text_block_list.text: Good work out there, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Today again, I couldn't get first place.
But, you did everything you could. It wasn't that bad.
But, you did everything you could. It wasn't that bad.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: There's something I need to tell you. I alreadyー
I can't do “that run” anymore… right?
I can't do “that run” anymore… right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Did you know?

No, I was watching the race and I noticed it. Looking at your 
figure, running desperately while struggling.

No, I was watching the race and I noticed it. Looking at your 
figure, running desperately while struggling.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I don't really know the reason.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
However, although it is slight, there is a thread in the sense, 
which makes me not run like before.
Narita Brian's run feeling got forgotten due to the injuryー

It affected her form, and in addition left her in the cruel 
reality of losing her run so far.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for keeping quiet. But I thought if I told you this, 
you would stop me from running.
That's right, I could have stopped you.
That's right, I could have stopped you.

But now it's different. Even if you can't run like before, you 
haven't changed at all.

But now it's different. Even if you can't run like before, you 
haven't changed at all.

I want to win, and I want to go straight to the finish line. 
Narita Brian who stole my heart, is still in front of me.

I want to win, and I want to go straight to the finish line. 
Narita Brian who stole my heart, is still in front of me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…My big-sister was right, you really are 
a trainer who puts Horse Girls first.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah… I'll keep running from now on!

Brian's next race is the “Haishin Grand 
Prize”, How to win with her so far…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh, so you were here! Trainer-san, I'm done warming up!

Oh, I'm sorry. I was just thinking about something. About what to 
do with Brian's training.

In order for her to give 100% of her power now, it's important 
that she learn to race differently than ever before…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Mmm… this talk sounds a bit difficult.

I don't have time to try everything, and the more I think about 
training the more I realize that nothing makes sense.

I don't have time to try everything, and the more I think about 
training the more I realize that nothing makes sense.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hmm～mm～… Even if you say it makes no sense, if I have a good 
enough head to think about it!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
After all it was you Ticket. You're the only girl whose voice I 
can hear from far away.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Woaaah～!! There is it, Trainer-san! The one with a big enough 
head to think is here!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hoy! I'm always saying that my head is 
not big… big enough head to think?
I see, you are Hayahide of theory, you may be qualified…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wait a minute, what are you talking about…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
How lively. I heard that Brian's next race was decided, so I made 
some Onigiri to boost performance.
Right! In addition, we also got Brian's opponent to think about!
Right! In addition, we also got Brian's opponent to think about!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …Huh! Are you talking about the battle?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Big-sister, and Amazon…?

I thought I'd ask Biwa Hayahide to think about training and 
running for the current Brian together with me.

And on the other side of the race is Hishi Amazon, who knows you 
well, it's okay for you, right?

And on the other side of the race is Hishi Amazon, who knows you 
well, it's okay for you, right?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you can leave such a thing to Big-sister Hishiama!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I don't know if a theory-based approach is right for you, but 
it's definitely a shortcut rather than groping and running.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
As strong as before… No, I need you to be stronger than before, 
otherwise it won't be a challenge for me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Hmph, let's take that stand.
All right! Then go with all your might towards victory!!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Hooray!!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I've been watching Hayahide's odd training! This is like, in 1 
month, you're going to be crazy, right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Seriously, those are what people wearing glasses are like. There 
is no shortage of training.
You're proud of your older-sister.
You're proud of your older-sister.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …That's right.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Both of your personalities are completely different, but it is 
indispensable to be conscious of each other's race and to be 
selected as “Annual representative Horse Girl” together.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Isn't it about time that this year's 
URA Award will be announced?
It should be announced in the program, let's watch it.
It should be announced in the program, let's watch it.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
At the “Kikkashou” you updated Narita Brian's record, you also 
won the following “Arima Kinen” brilliantly!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Mayano Top Gun, who's momentum has not stopped, was selected as 
the “Annual Representative Horse Girl”!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah, Um, Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It was probably your best first year, but 
what would you like to have this year?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's of course, I want to have a lot of races that can make 
everyone and Maya herself get excited while watching!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: I see, we can expect a great race again this year.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
By the way, Mayano Top Gun do you have a partner that can make 
you excited right now?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yes! Here! She's here!! The one who can make Maya excited!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
In last year's “Hanshin Grand Prize” The 
race of that person was really great…!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Somehow, every race feels as I thought…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hmm～, I want to feel the throbbing excitement～! Maybe, I should 
have gone back to school without going to seeー

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Pushing forward!! The difference with the subsequent one is 
opening up more and more!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: …heh, No way-no way!? She is still getting faster…!?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
No one can catch up with her anymore! Now it's just a stand-alone 
state!! 6 lengths, 7 lengths difference now, Goal!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Woah… Amazing…!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
I was really excited, my heart was pounding, and that's when Maya 
said she wanted to run with her one day and race like that!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: …But, she hasn't won a race since she got injured…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But-but! I understood when I ran together 
with her in the “Arima Kinen”!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
The excitement that I felt on that day and the 
power that I felt so excited about have not changed 
anything from that time, so Mayaー

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: want to run with Narita Brian-san one more time!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
Is it a confrontation between the old and new “Annual 
representative horse girl”!? This will raise expectations!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
How would have thought… She is the same as Brian-san, 
she is a powerful girl enough to conquer the “Arima 
Kinen” in the classic class.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …No matter who is the opponent, there is no problem.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Supported by this much, the desire for 
victoryー is just a play to me!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Yeah…!
